titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 729) to amend the Coastal Zone Management Act of 1972 to authorize grants to Indian Tribes to further achievement of Tribal coastal zone objectives, and for other purposes.

Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 729) to amend the Coastal Zone Management Act of 1972 to authorize grants to Indian Tribes to further achievement of Tribal coastal zone objectives, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 116-330, by Mr. Morelle.

An amendment in the nature of a substitute consisting of the text of Rules Committee Print 116-40 shall be considered as adopted in the House and in the Committee of the Whole and shall be considered as the original bill for the purpose of further amendment under the five-minute rule.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 58.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 748.

POSTPONED PROCEEDINGS - At the conclusion of debate on H. Res. 748, the Chair put the question on ordering the previous question and by voice vote, announced the ayes had prevailed. Mrs. Lesko demanded the yeas and nays and the Chair postponed further proceedings on ordering the previous question on H. Res. 748 until later in the legislative day.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 226 - 188 (Roll no. 657).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 226 - 189 (Roll no. 658).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: This resolution sets forth the rule for consideration of H.R. 729 (Tribal Coastal Resiliency Act).
